org.zoolu.net
Class UdpSocket

java.lang.Object
  |
  +--org.zoolu.net.UdpSocket
public class UdpSocket
extends java.lang.Object

UdpSocket provides a uniform interface to UDP transport protocol, regardless J2SE or J2ME is used.
